    Package Description
    nl.tudelft.jpacman.level  
    nl.tudelft.jpacman.npc.ghost
    This package contains some approximate implementations of the original Pac-Man AIs.

      Methods in nl.tudelft.jpacman.npc.ghost that return Ghost 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Ghost GhostFactory.createBlinky()

      Ghost GhostFactory.createClyde()
      Creates a new Clyde / Pokey, the orange Ghost.
      Ghost GhostFactory.createInky()
      Creates a new Inky / Bashful, the cyan Ghost.
      Ghost GhostFactory.createPinky()
      Creates a new Pinky / Speedy, the pink Ghost.
